movies.title: Seven Samurai
movies.description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves in feudal Japan.

movies.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movies.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I.

movies.title: Metropolis
movies.description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet.

movies.title: Rashomon
movies.description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

movies.title: The Seventh Seal
movies.description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.description: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

movies.title: City of God
movies.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

movies.title: Modern Times
movies.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.title: Ran
movies.description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, his decision to divide his land leads to tragedy.

movies.title: Barry Lyndon
movies.description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

movies.title: The Great Dictator
movies.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

movies.title: Sunset Boulevard
movies.description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

movies.title: Andrei Rublev
movies.description: The life, times and hardships of 15th-century Russian icon painter Andrei Rublev.

movies.title: Amélie
movies.description: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

movies.title: The Battleship Potemkin
movies.description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers.

movies.title: Cinema Paradiso
movies.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movies.trailer: /uploads/1744543678335-The Man Who Almost Broke Math (And Himself...).mp4

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.trailer: /uploads/1744547465568-Ultimate Classic Mr. Bean Compilation ï½ Non Stop 5 Hours ï½ Mr. Bean Official [agBuBFbGZAQ].mp4

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
